title: Greg Hands – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Greg Hands, the Conservative MP for Chelsea and Fulham, on 9 April 2021.
content:
First time I met Prince Philip was, in retrospect, very funny.
